item.description:
Come enjoy the drinks without the workout (just promise yourself you'll wake up early on Friday to hit the gym....yeah, right) -- happy hour at Waxy's is from 4-7 but at 7:01 I guarantee you'll still be happy enough to hang a bit longer. Come after work, bring a few friends and let the people watching commence.

P.S. - I hear there's karaoke on Thursday nights :-)
item.how_to_find_us: Sorry - no bike in tow :-) But text/call when you're there and we'll grab a table (781.801.9663)
item.name: Grub and Guzzle (without the Grind!) - Happy Hour at Waxy O'Connors
